hero_section.title: AI-Powered Apps
hero_section.subtitle: Smarter, Faster, Adaptive Software
hero_section.description: We build AI-driven applications that understand, predict, and personalize, helping your business run smarter.

introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we build AI-powered apps that blend software, machine learning, and automation to analyze data, understand language, and deliver intelligent results faster.
From chatbots to recommendations and predictive dashboards, our scalable AI apps help industries like retail, healthcare, and finance unlock smarter digital experiences.
introduction_section.highlight_quote: “Smarter AI apps, faster insights, 3x business efficiency.”

key_benefits_section.title: Key Benefits
key_benefits_section.subtitle: Transform your operations with proven results

cards.title: Smarter Workflows
cards.description: Automate repetitive tasks and decision-making with AI.

cards.title: Personalized Experiences
cards.description: Deliver recommendations, predictions, and tailored content to users.

cards.title: Scalable Performance
cards.description: AI models optimized for real-time performance and cloud-native scaling.

cards.title: Continuous Learning
cards.description: Apps that get smarter with every interaction.

what_you_get_section.title: What you'll get when you choose AI-Powered Apps

list_items.title: 1. Intelligent Applications
list_items.description: Custom web or mobile apps built to solve real business problems with AI.

list_items.title: 2. Integrated AI Models
list_items.description: Seamless features for chat, vision, and predictive analytics.

list_items.title: 3. API Endpoints
list_items.description: Easy integration with your existing systems and workflows.

list_items.title: 4. Documentation & Training
list_items.description: Clear guides and training to ensure smooth adoption.

technologies_section.title: We work with modern, proven technologies
technologies_section.subtitle: Industry-leading tools for maximum reliability and performance

process_section.title: Our Process
process_section.subtitle: From concept to launch in 6 weeks

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Deploy, monitor, and optimize your automation systems

problem.label: Problem
problem.text: A retail client needed to reduce cart abandonment and improve user engagement.

solution.label: Solution
solution.text: We built an AI-powered recommendation engine into their e-commerce app.

result.label: Result
result.text: Conversion rates improved by 18% and session times increased by 25%.

questions.question: How long does it take to build an MVP?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: Can you integrate AI features into my existing SaaS?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: What tech stack do you use for SaaS?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
